segments.text: May I know where you are going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I want to go to Beijing Hotel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry . You are going in the wrong direction .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh no ! What shall I do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry . You can get off at the next stop and go across the street through the overpass . The bus stop is right there .
segments.speaker: S1
